quote.text: Love is the ultimate experience. There is no obstacle that love cannot overcome.
quote.author: Yogi Bhajan

history.title: Our Story
history.p1: ACIKY was born from the vision of sharing the transformative tools of yoga and meditation with every corner of our community. We believe that wellness is not a luxury, but a fundamental right for all.
history.p2: Over the years, we have built a refuge of peace where ancestral tradition meets the rhythm of modern life, offering a path towards physical, mental, and spiritual balance.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: ACIKY was founded with the purpose of expanding Kundalini Yoga in Cuba, making this transformative practice accessible to all people seeking balance, inner peace, and personal growth.

kundalini.title: What is Kundalini Yoga?
kundalini.description: Kundalini Yoga is an ancient practice that combines physical postures, breathing techniques, meditation, and mantras to awaken the vital energy that resides at the base of the spine.

team.title: Our Team
team.empty: You will soon meet our team

cta.title: Ready to begin?
cta.description: Join our community and start your journey towards holistic wellness.
